title: Katie And The Zombie Queen: A Young Adult Coming of Age Fantasy and Supernatural Thriller: Dark Resurrection
description:
She has nothing left to live for – except revenge.With her heart torn asunder, Katie finds herself entwined in a harrowing battle for possession of her soul. Her relentless hunt for the Zombie Queen will continue with an unexpected companion at her side. But they’ll soon discover a much greater evil hiding in the shadows. With a diverse band of allies, each bearing their own scars, Katie embarks on a journey to save her friends from destruction.Can she vanquish the darkness and restore hope to a world teetering on the brink of oblivion?From the pen of bestselling author Scott W. Kimak comes another tale of love, loss, and suspense in part two of this breathtaking series. If you like action-packed nail-biters that keep you on the edge of your seat, then you'll love Katie and the Zombie Queen.
Buy Katie and the Zombie Queen, and get ready for the ride of your life today!
author: Scott W Kimak
